timeline.author: varyvol

timeline.body: Should it be added even if already there?
timeline.bodyText: Should it be added even if already there?
timeline.bodyHTML: Should it be added even if already there?
timeline.author: varyvol

replies.bodyText:
The put method is not the Map one, is a custom method which makes two things:

Put the event in the list of already printed, if needed
Put the event in the list of events to send to Telemetry, if there is space for it (only 100 per day)
replies.author: MRamonLeon

timeline.author: jglick

timeline.body:
```suggestion
            {"sun.reflect.generics.factory.CoreReflectionFactory", "makeNamedType"}, // JENKINS-61920
```

so you do not need to patch the previous line the next time you add an entry
timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        {"sun.reflect.generics.factory.CoreReflectionFactory", "makeNamedType"} // JENKINS-61920
          
          
            
                        {"sun.reflect.generics.factory.CoreReflectionFactory", "makeNamedType"}, // JENKINS-61920
          
      
    
    
  

so you do not need to patch the previous line the next time you add an entry
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
{"sun.reflect.generics.factory.CoreReflectionFactory", "makeNamedType"} // JENKINS-61920

so you do not need to patch the previous line the next time you add an entry
